c1.name: Dreams of the Foamy Deep
c1.effect: The CRIT Rate of **Pressurized Floe: Shattering Pressure** will be increased by 15%.

c2.name: Penguins and the Land of Plenty
c2.effect: Unleashing **Pressurized Floe: Shattering Pressure** will restore 2 Energy to Freminet. If a Pressure Level 4 Shattering Pressure is unleashed, this will restore 3 Energy.

c3.name: Song of the Eddies and Bleached Sands
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Normal Attack: Flowing Eddies** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Dance of the Snowy Moon and Flute
c4.effect: After Freminet triggers Frozen, Shatter, or Superconduct against opponents, his ATK will be increased by 9% for 6s. Max 2 stacks. This can be triggered once every 0.3s.

c5.name: Nights of Hearth and Happiness
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Pressurized Floe** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Moment of Waking and Resolve
c6.effect: After Freminet triggers Frozen, Shatter, or Superconduct against opponents, his CRIT DMG will be increased by 12% for 6s. Max 3 stacks. This can be triggered once every 0.3s.
